about_the_game:
Angel Roulette: An Immersive Multiplayer Turn-Based Tabletop Game

Can support three players live battle

"Welcome to try it for free"v0.2.2

Game Overview:
Angel Roulette, a multiplayer turn-based tabletop game that combines strategy, customization, and competition, allows players to freely choose from a diverse range of weapons and pair them with special function items in a meticulously designed game world, engaging in battles that require both intelligence and bravery.

Personalized Customization:
Players can not only experience thrilling battles but also fully express their individual style. By accumulating resources and experience through combat, players can unlock and customize their character's clothing and physique. A vast selection of outfits and accessories awaits exploration, enabling each player to create a unique in-game image.

Competitive Challenges and Achievement Showcases:
Victory in battle not only brings honor but also abundant resources and experience points, aiding players in leveling up. Furthermore, these glorious feats will be recorded on the global rankings, pitting you against players worldwide to demonstrate your extraordinary prowess.

Story Background:
Step into the fantastical world of the "Wheel of Destiny" TV reality show, a boundless arena filled with challenges. The winners will reap lucrative prizes, and its star attraction—the Roulette Game—is truly ingenious. Players will personally select their weapons, each with unique rules, gameplay, and item quantities, testing their wisdom and decision-making abilities.

Gameplay Depth Analysis:
Weapon Selection: Players have access to multiple weapons from the start, including Revolver (6 rounds, balanced damage), Pump-Action Shotgun (5 rounds, high damage), Bolt-Action Rifle (5 rounds, extreme damage), and the amusing Slap (3 rounds, small but fun).

Special Items: The game is filled with various special items such as First Aid Kits, Magic Potions, Future Envelopes, Oracle Rings, Grenades, etc. They can turn the tide of battle at crucial moments and add infinite possibilities to your path to victory.
In the world of Angel Roulette, every choice is crucial, and every battle is full of variables.

Diverse Game Modes:
Solo Challenge: Compete against AI players in the lobby to hone your skills and accumulate experience.
Multiplayer Battle: Connect online to battle real-time against players worldwide, with your performance directly reflected in the rankings, striving for the top honors.
Spectator Mode: A unique viewing experience, watch two AIs battle automatically, guess the outcome, or even try your hand at placing bets for a different kind of game enjoyment.

Conclusion:
In the world of Angel Roulette, every choice matters, and every battle is fraught with variables. Prepare to face the challenge, showcase your wisdom and courage, and prove your strength to the world! Good luck, for the path to championship awaits you!"

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, the player can use guns to shoot enemies, can use cold weapons to attack enemies, can use explosives and set traps.  The same computer-controlled enemy will do the same thing to the player.  There are monsters in the game that attack and bite the player.  Players can practice yoga movements and fitness movements in the yoga gym, players can practice dance movements in the dance studio, players can change clothes in the changing room and customize the figure of the character.
